_comment: Created by EFisher on 26/03/2014 16:56:11 using v2.1
title: How have trusts breaching the 8 minute target for Red 1 and 2 calls changed over time?
analysis_commentary: When there is a breach in the A8 standard nationally, there is also a corresponding breach to the standard locally in more than 50% of ambulance trusts. So nationally poor performance is a collective result of poor performance in the majority of trusts rather than the result of a few outliers.
data_source: NHS England, Ambulance Quality Indicators: System Indicators
